comments:
This may be related to bug 47255, where classloading does not work if there is 
a backgound build going on.
I'll let you be the judge.

Build: I-20040121

I opened my workspace.  A background build kicked in, during which I launched 
a runtime workbench.  I got the following NPE in my log:
